titleStmt.title: Three seasonable quæres, proposed to all those cities, counties and boroughs, whose respective citizens, knights and burgesses have been forcibly excluded, uniustly eiected, and disabled to sit in the Commons house, by those now acting at Westminster.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward Thomas, at the Adam and Eve in Little Britain,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
